alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 16 at 6:04PM EDT until September 17 at 12:55AM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Melbourne FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Little Wekiva River near Altamonte Springs 2n affecting Seminole County. .Intense rainfall accumulating 2 to 3 inches basin average has produced a rapid rise in the Little Wekiva river basin in southwest Seminole County. The river will crest shortly just above Minor Flood Stage and should gradually fall back below both Minor Flood Stage and Action Stage through this evening. For the Little Wekiva...including Altamonte Springs 2n...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1215 AM EDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2n. * WHEN...From this evening to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 28.5 feet, Minor flooding near the river in the Altamonte Springs area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 PM EDT Friday the stage was 28.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:30 PM EDT Friday was 28.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 26.4 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 28.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time 6pm 7pm 8pm 9pm 10pm Little Wekiva River Altamonte Springs 2 28.5 28.8 Fri 5 pm 28.6 28.4 28.2 27.8 27.6 &&
